caption: I travel all throughout the country for work and I frequent hotel bars. I had a terrible experience at this place. My husband, his friends, and I went to this bar to drink after going out. There was a creepy man sitting at the bar watching every move everyone made. Someone in our party took a shot and accidentally spit out some of his drink up while taking the shot. At this point the creepy man at the bar was upset about that and was watching our every move. My husband said a curse word in conversation and the creepy man spoke up and said we needed to leave. I asked this man to please mind his business. He then proceeded to tell me that this was HIS bar and it was his business... this man was very confrontational. Anyway I would avoid this place because it is very easy to upset "the owner." I am assuming he does not like to have customers.

Found a new little gem in HSV AL: VistaBar! If you are looking for something different than same ol' same ol' then give this restaurant a visit. Super tasty food, everything fresh to market and a culinary highlight. According to owner the chef is decorated with multiple awards.
Great service ,great food

We love BarVista and had another incredible evening there this past weekend! It was quite windy but the heated ceilings paired with the clear pull-downs provided just enough warmth. At the bartender’s recommendation, we tried the crispy potatoes and they had the perfect amount of seasoning and crisp - not to mention the ideal shareable! We tried a few different drinks (Orange Paloma, Moscow Mule, and Tequila Mojito) and all were delightfully refreshing. BarVista is such a fantastic addition to HSV and the perfect spot for an intimate group or couple while still maintaining social distance. Cannot wait for warmer weather to enjoy the terrace to the fullest! Views are a must-see, and the staff takes extremely good care of you. Service is top notch! A++

This place is amazing!  The staff is knowledgeable, the food is unbelievable, and the views are breathtaking.  They have a large selection of every type of liquor.  Their tequila and bourbon selections are outstanding. If you want a night out with your bae or just a quick cocktail, this is the place to be!

Bar Vista is one of my favorite spots for great drinks and food. The staff is friendly and knowledgable. They have a huge list of bourbons, tequilas, and local brews! I highly recommend the pimento cheese appetizer and the steak sandwich. The burger is also amazing. I have had everything on their menu, and never had a bad dish. The spirits, food, and view make Bar Vista a spectacular spot to unwind.

Love this place. Staff is amazing.. very friendly and helpful and bartender know how to make a great drink. Food is awesome. If you are interested in a great place to go for a great drink and great food come to Bar Vista you won't be disappointed

The hotel for being a newer hotel it looked dated, the shower arm wouldn't stay up so it was challenging to take a shower, it was so hot when we arrived in the rm we had to turn the AC on, you can tell that house keeping and maintenance are not communicating with issues and that Maintenance are not completing their quarterly inspections correctly
Great view and great service
Excellent place to eat and grab a few drinks. I have been at the hotel for 6 weeks and the bar/restaurant never disappoint!

Staff was friendly. Most expensive Margarita I’ve ever had and can’t believe they charge $20 for a marg! Would stay at hotel again but being ripped off at the bar leaves a bad taste for customer experience

Amazing views of downtown Huntsville. The drinks were amazing and they had plenty of screens to watch whatever we wanted. The service was absolutely fantastic and every person we dealt with went above and beyond to make our night amazing!
Love, love, love! ❤
I liked it. Good happy hour
Nice bar, nice view front of park and small lake, good background music, friendly, good service, clean, tvs to watch games, park in the street, second floor, enter de Hotel.
Beat bar in town!  Hope the can reopen soon!!  Great bar tenders and atmosphere!!
Bar Vista is my new favorite spot whenever I come back home to visit..

My fiancé and I had a decent experience....both pros and cons. The skinny, management was friendly while parking is terrible. Drinks are expensive but the atmosphere is great. We have friends that stayed at the hotel when it was new and said they had valet parking. More affordable selection and bring valet parking back and I’ll return with 5 ⭐️.

Worse bar experience I’ve encountered in the Huntsville Area. Manager was extremely rude. My boyfriend forgot his credit card in his truck, while he went down to get it the manager threaten to have us arrested if he did not return after only being gone for 10 mins. Seeing how he had to park far due to lack of parking near the hotel. The premium liquor there is also unrealistically high, we will not be going back.
This place thinks its in Las Vegas with 70 dollar tequila shots manegment was rude and unwelcoming will not be going back.

Great atmosphere and an awesome view. The staff was friendly and helpful, and the drinks/selection was good. The bar is open to the outdoors, but I stayed plenty warm with the heaters they had on. I’m looking forward to when they have a specialty cocktail and food menu.

Knowledgeable and helpful staff with a great variety of Tequilas available. I absolutely love the view and the spacing of the tables kept it from feeling claustrophobic. I can only imagine it will get better when the food is available and the weather gets warmer.
Awesome tequila selection. They had everything to make my Old Fashioned and Manhattan. They did mention that they will get some weather curtains soon. That'll make it even better.
Great tequila selection, including some rare finds. Just a little open to the weather.
